attributes.action: Stop the closure of Auchinlee Care Home, Campbeltown, Argyll.
attributes.background: Elderly and dementia patients face the prospect of being evicted from their place of residence, where they have been for many years. With no other suitable accommodation locally, all face the uncertainty of being moved away from the community to which they belong, and from their families.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors

You may be able to start a petition to the Scottish Parliament about this. You can contact the clerks of the Public Petitions Committee for advice about this by emailing petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
